judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
The judgment of the Superior Court is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Ervin, reported at 187 Pa. Superior Ct. 236, 144 A. 2d 610.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: C. Brewster Rhoads, with him G. Thomas Miller, Donald J. Farage, and Bailey, Pearson, Miller & Bolton, and Montgomery, McCracken, Walker & Rhoads, for appellant.
Martin H. Lock, Assistant District Attorney, with him H. F. Dowling, District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Stone.
Argued March 19, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and McBride, JJ.
C. Brewster Rhoads, with him G. Thomas Miller, Donald J. Farage, and Bailey, Pearson, Miller & Bolton, and Montgomery, McCracken, Walker & Rhoads, for appellant.
Martin H. Lock, Assistant District Attorney, with him H. F. Dowling, District Attorney, for appellee.
May 8, 1959:
